other_tests.findings: Showed diverticulosis and two polyps which were excised and proved to be benign.
Revealed no flow in the right common femoral artery and absent systolic pressures in the right ankle.
Demonstrated active bleeding in the rectosigmoid colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Confirmed site of bleeding to be the sigmoid colon, with an apparent arterioenteric fistula.
